mapper.sql: vote_item_id, item_name, item_img_url, author_name, author_head_img_url, item_create_time, item_create_user, vote_id, item_update_time, item_update_user, item_is_del, item_link
mapper.select:
SELECT i.*, (SELECT count(DISTINCT t.TICKET_ID) FROM ccp_vote_ticket t WHERE t.vote_item_id = i.vote_item_id ) as VOTE_COUNT,
0 as is_vote
IF((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT t.TICKET_ID) FROM ccp_vote_ticket t WHERE t.vote_item_id = i.vote_item_id
AND DATE_FORMAT(t.VOTE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')
AND USER_ID = #{userId} )>0,1,0) AS is_vote
FROM ccp_vote_item i
WHERE i.vote_id=#{voteId} and i.item_is_del =1
and vote_item_id=#{voteItemId}
order by VOTE_COUNT DESC,
i.item_create_time desc
limit ${resultFirst},${resultSize}
mapper.insert:
insert into ccp_vote_item
vote_item_id,
item_name,
item_img_url,
author_name,
author_head_img_url,
item_create_time,
item_create_user,
vote_id,
item_update_time,
item_update_user,
item_is_del,
item_link,
#{voteItemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{itemImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{authorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{authorHeadImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{itemCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{itemCreateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{voteId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{itemUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{itemUpdateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{itemIsDel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{itemLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update ccp_vote_item
item_name = #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
item_img_url = #{itemImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
author_name = #{authorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
author_head_img_url = #{authorHeadImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
item_create_time = #{itemCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
item_create_user = #{itemCreateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vote_id = #{voteId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
item_update_time = #{itemUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
item_update_user = #{itemUpdateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
item_is_del = #{itemIsDel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
item_link = #{itemLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where vote_item_id = #{voteItemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ccp_vote_item set item_name = #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item_img_url = #{itemImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author_name = #{authorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author_head_img_url = #{authorHeadImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item_create_time = #{itemCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, item_create_user = #{itemCreateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vote_id = #{voteId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item_update_time = #{itemUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, item_update_user = #{itemUpdateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item_is_del = #{itemIsDel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, item_link = #{itemLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where vote_item_id = #{voteItemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
